standard.description: Standards for correctly implementing Redwood patterns

test.test_name: Redwood Buttons should be correctly placed
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case when apb.display_position in ('Region Body', 'Body')
                         then case when apr.template not in ('Blank with Attributes','Collapsible','Cards Container')
                                   then 'BUTTON_RW_POSITION'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    apb.application_id,
                    apb.page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    apb.last_updated_by,
                    apb.last_updated_on,
                    apb.display_position_code,
                    apb.button_is_hot,
                    apb.display_position,
                    apb.button_name,
                    apb.button_id component_id,
                    apb.button_template,
                    apb.button_position,
                    apr.template,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
                    abo.status_on_export,
						        apb.workspace
            from apex_application_page_buttons apb 
            inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on apb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                                         and apb.page_id = apr.page_id
                                                         and apb.region_id = apr.region_id
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on apb.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and apb.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join apex_applications aa on apb.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 1000
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                               and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
						where apb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
						and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format ('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in position `%3` but should be in a Redwood button position',
                            p0 => std.button_name,
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id,
                            p3 => std.display_position) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format ('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly placed',
                            p0 => std.button_name,
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.button_is_hot,
       std.display_position,
       std.button_name,
       std.component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
       std.button_template,
       std.button_position,
       std.template region_template,
       std.display_position_code,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: It is rarely correct to place Redwood buttons in the 'Region Body'/'Body' position.
test.fix: Place the button in a Redwood, non-legacy position

test.test_name: Additional Info regions are correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('Region', 'Blank with Attributes')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Additional Information'
test.explanation: Regions in the 'Additional Information' position should have a template of 'Region'
test.fix: Change the template or place in a different position

test.test_name: Smart filter regions are correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.display_position  not in ('Smart Filters & Search', 'Smart Filters')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_position) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
test.explanation: Any regions of source type `Smart Filters` should be in the display position `Smart Filters & Search` or `Smart Filters`. As of the time of this writing, the 2 region templates that represent these display positions are `Page Header` and `Collection Toolbar`, so consider placing your region in a region of these template types.
test.fix: Correct the display position

test.test_name: Item Overview Content is correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('Region','Blank with Attributes')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_template = 'Item Overview'
and aapr.display_position = 'Content Body'
test.explanation: Regions in the 'Content Body' position of a page with an 'Item Overview' template should have a template of 'Region'
test.fix: Correct the page template, display position or region template

test.test_name: Login regions are configured correctly
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template != 'Login'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and display_position = 'Content Body'
and aap.page_template = 'Login'
test.explanation: Regions in the Content Body section of a page of template `Login`  should have a template of `Login`
test.fix: Correct the page template, region template or display position

test.test_name: Banner Message region should only have Links
test.query_clob:
with std as (select application_id, page_id, region_id, count(*) btn_cnt
                from apex_application_page_buttons apb
                where apb.button_template != 'Link'
                group by application_id, page_id, region_id)
select case when std.btn_cnt is null
            then 'Y'
            when std.btn_cnt > 0
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2, template `%3`) should only have buttons of template `Link`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has misconfigured buttons', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join std on  aapr.application_id = std.application_id
                    and aapr.page_id = std.page_id
                    and aapr.region_id = std.region_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.template = 'Banner Message'
and aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Redwood regions of template `Banner Message` should only have buttons of template `Link`
test.fix: Change the button templates to `Link`

test.test_name: Region in "Page Navigation" is correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('Page Header')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Page Navigation'
test.explanation: Any region in the `Page Navigation` display position should have a template of `Page Header`
test.fix: Correct the template or display position

       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,

left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option

and aapr.display_position = 'Score Board'
test.explanation: Any region in the `Score Board` display position should have a template of `Cards Container`
test.fix: Correct the template or display position

test.test_name: Visualization regions are correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.display_position  in ('Visualization (Chart)')
            then case when aapr.template  not in ('Panel')
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aapr.template  not in ('Visualization')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2, position `%3`) has the wrong template: `%4`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_position,
        p4 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_position,
        p4 => aapr.template) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and display_position like '%Visualization%'
test.explanation: Any region in a `Visualization` display position should have a template of `Visualization`, unless the display position is `Visualization (Chart)` , in which case the region template should be `Panel`
test.fix: Correct the region template

        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,

       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Timestamp & Actions'
test.explanation: Any region in a `Timestamp & Actions` display position should have a template of `Guided Process Footer`
test.fix: Correct the display position or template

test.test_name: Use Foldout panels in the Panels positions
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template != 'Foldout Panel'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
				p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.region_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Horizontal Header)','AO Foldout (Vertical Header)')
and aapr.display_position = 'Panels'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Given a `Foldout` page template, any region in the `Panels` display position should have a template of `Foldout Panel`
test.fix: Correct the region template

test.test_name: Contextual Info regions should be configured correctly
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('No Template', 'Blank with Attributes')
            then 'N'
            when aapr.display_position != 'Contextual Info'
            then 'N'
            when aapr.report_template != 'Contextual Info (Row)'
            then 'N'
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Horizontal Header)','Foldout (Horizontal Header)')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%js-ConveyorBelt%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--horizontal%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelInline%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Vertical Header)','Foldout (Vertical Header)','Item Overview','AO Item Overview','Item Overview')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--vertical%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelStacked%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO General Overview','General Overview','Generic')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured (template `%3`, display position `%4`, template options `%5`, report template `%6`, page template `%7`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aapr.display_position,
        p5 => aapr.component_template_options,
        p6 => aapr.report_template,
        p7 => aap.page_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aa.theme_number,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.theme_number = 1000
and aapr.region_name = 'Contextual Info'
and aapr.source_type = 'Report'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
The Contextual Info Classic Report should be:

1.  inside the `Contextual info`  display position
2.  with a template of `none`  or `Blank with Attributes`
3.  with a report template of `Contextual Info (Row)`

### Page template considerations

### `Foldout (Horizontal Header)`

1.  Check `Conveyor Belt`
2.  Set Layout to `Horizontal`
3.  Set Label to `Inline`
4.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `Foldout (Vertical Header)` / `Item Overview`

1.  Set Layout to `Vertical`
2.  Set Label to `Stacked`
3.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `General Overview` / `Generic`

1.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`
test.fix: Correct the display position, template, report template or template options

test.test_name: Regions in "Table of Contents" are correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('Guided Process Region')
            then 'N'
            when aapr.source_type not in ('List')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template (`%3`) or source type (`%4`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aapr.source_type) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Table of Contents'
test.explanation: Any region in the `Table of Contents` display position should be a `List` and with a template of `Guided Process Region`
test.fix: Correct the region type, display position or template

test.test_name: Breadcrumbs have a template and position of "Page Header"
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.display_position = 'Page Header'
            then 'Y'
            when aapr.template = 'Page Header'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have both a template and position of "Page Header" (position `%3`, template `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
				p3 => aapr.display_position,
				p4 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template or position', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aa.theme_number,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.theme_number  = 1000
and aapr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Regions with a Source type of `Breadcrumb` should be in the `Page Header` display position and with a template of `Page Header`
test.fix: Correct the display position and/or template

test.test_name: Regions in the "Page Header" position are correctly config
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template in ('Blank with Attributes','No Template')
            then 'Y'
            when aap.page_template in ('Foldout (Vertical Header)','AO Foldout (Vertical Header)')

                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end

            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,

       null created_by,
       null created_on,

       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template: `%3` (page template `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aap.page_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Page Header'

       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,

       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 1000
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position in ('Welcome Banner', 'Banners')

test.fix: Change the template or position

from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id

                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id

test.test_name: Toast regions should only have links
test.query_clob:
with std as (select application_id, page_id, region_id, count(*) btn_cnt
                from apex_application_page_buttons apb
                where apb.button_template != 'Link'
                group by application_id, page_id, region_id)
select case when std.btn_cnt is null
            then 'Y'
            when std.btn_cnt > 0
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2, template `%3`) should only have buttons of template `Link`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has misconfigured buttons', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join std on  aapr.application_id = std.application_id
                    and aapr.page_id = std.page_id
                    and aapr.region_id = std.region_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.template = 'Toast'
and aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Toast regions should only have buttons that a template of `Link`
test.fix: Change the button template to `Link`

test.test_name: Toast regions with the custom icon setting should have an icon
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.icon_css_classes is null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing an icon: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.region_template_options) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing an icon', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapr.icon_css_classes,
       aapr.region_template_options
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.template = 'Toast'
and aapr.region_template_options like '%rw-Toast--customIcon%'
test.explanation: Toast regions with the `Custom` value for the `Icon` setting should have an icon specified in the `Icon` field
test.fix:
If the `Template Options`  > `Icon`  setting is set to `Custom` , you must specify a Redwood Icon in the `Appearance`  > `Icon`  field

You can look redwood icons [here](r/redwood/redwood-sample-application/icon-browser "redwood icons").

test.test_name: Item Overview Regions should have an Icon or Initials
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.icon_css_classes is not null 
            then 'Y'
            when aapda.action_code in ('PLUGIN_REDWOOD_AVATAR','PLUGIN_REDWOOD_BADGE')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfiguration : Icon `%3`, DA Action Code `%4`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.icon_css_classes,
        p4 => aapda.action_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapda.action_code,
       aapr.icon_css_classes
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
left outer join apex_application_page_da_acts aapda on aapr.application_id = aapda.application_id
                                                    and aapr.page_id = aapda.page_id
                                                    and aapr.region_id = aapda.affected_region_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.template = 'Item Overview'
test.explanation: Regions with the `Item Overview` template should have an Icon, Badge or Initials configured
test.fix:
Either

1.  Provide a Redwood Icon in the Appearance > Icon field
2.  Configure a page load Dynamic Action with a `Redwood - Avatar`  or `Redwood - Badge` action. This Dynamic Action sets the requisite icon, badge or initials for the region

You can look Redwood icons [here](r/redwood/redwood-sample-application/icon-browser "redwood icons").

test.test_name: List Entries should use the correct icons
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case when aale.entry_image like 'fa%'
                         then 'N'
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    aale.application_id, 
                    null page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    aale.last_updated_by,
                    aale.last_updated_on,
                    aale.list_entry_id component_id,
                    aale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
                    aale.entry_image,
                    aale.entry_text,
						        aale.workspace
               from apex_application_list_entries aale
               inner join apex_applications aa on aale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                             and aa.theme_number = 1000
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aale.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aale.application_id
               where aale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
               and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude')
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       std.component_id,
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.entry_image,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('List entry `%0` (app %1) uses a Univeral Theme icon (`%2`). You must use a Redwood icon.',
                    p0 => std.entry_text,
                    p1 => std.application_id,
                    p2 => std.entry_image
                    )
            end  validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('List entry `%0` (app %1) uses an invalid icon',
                    p0 => std.entry_text,
                    p1 => std.application_id
                    )
            end  issue_title, 
       std.entry_text,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: List entries must not use a Universal theme icon in the `entry_image` field
test.fix: Replace the icon with a Redwood icon. You can look them up [here](r/redwood/redwood-sample-application/icon-browser "redwood icons").

test.test_name: Do not manipulates classes, text and attributes in Redwood
test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.removeclass%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.addclass%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.text%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.prop%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapda.workspace,
       aapda.application_id, 
       aapda.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapda.last_updated_by,
       aapda.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) manipulates the DOM: `%3...`', 
        p0 => aapda.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapda.application_id,
        p2 => aapda.page_id,
        p3 => substr(aapda.attribute_01,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` manipulates the DOM (app %1, page %2, action id %3)', 
        p0 => aapda.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapda.application_id,
        p2 => aapda.page_id,
				p3 => aapda.action_id) issue_title,
       aapda.action_id component_id,
       aapda.dynamic_action_id parent_component_id,
       aapda.dynamic_action_name,
       aapda.attribute_01 javascript_code
from apex_application_page_da_acts aapda
inner join apex_applications aa on aapda.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 1000
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapda.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapda.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapda.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapda.application_id
where aapda.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapda.action_code = 'NATIVE_JAVASCRIPT_CODE'
test.explanation: It should not be necessary to manipulate the dom for redwood components in redwood
test.fix: Submit query and if possible, a video of the problem to apex-gbu-rw

test.test_name: Health apps should have Sky Pillar set
test.query_clob:
select case 
            when jt.firstclass = 'rw-Pillar--sky'
                then 'Y'
            else 'N'
        end pass_yn, 
        aats.name theme_name, 
        jt.firstclass,
       aa.workspace,
       aa.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       aa.created_by,
       aa.created_on,
       aa.last_updated_by,
       aa.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` (app %1) Theme Roller has the wrong selection under Redwood Options > Pillar: `%2`', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id,
				p2 => jt.firstclass) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` (app %1) Theme Roller has the wrong selection under Redwood Options > Pillar: `%2`', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id,
				p2 => jt.firstclass) issue_title,
       aa.application_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aa.application_name,
       aa.alias,
       aa.availability_status
from apex_applications aa
     inner join apex_application_theme_styles aats on aats.application_id = aa.application_id and aats.is_current = 'Yes'
     cross join json_table(aats.theme_roller_config, '$'
                           columns(firstclass varchar2(100) path '$.classes[0]')) jt 
where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
  and aats.theme_number = 1000
test.explanation: For all Oracle Health applications, Sky is the official Redwood Pillar to be used, as confirmed by the Redwood Team.
test.fix:
If you have a Redwood Themed application, you must select Sky as the Pillar option under Theme Roller.

*   If you do not see this option under _**Theme Roller > Redwood Options > Pillar**_, your application may have an outdated version of the Redwood Theme in APEX. Proceed to updating to the latest version by subscribing to Application 9000.

test.test_name: Buttons should the correct icons
test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.icon_css_classes like 'fa%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) is using an invalid icon : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.icon_css_classes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` has UT icon (app %1, page %2, button id %4)', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.icon_css_classes,
        p4 => aapb.button_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       aapb.region_id parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
       aapb.database_action,
       aapb.icon_css_classes,
       aa.theme_number
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_applications aa on aapb.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 1000
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Redwood Buttons cannot use Universal Theme icons
test.fix: Replace the icon with a Redwood icon. You can look them up [here](r/redwood/redwood-sample-application/icon-browser "redwood icons").

test.test_name: Redwood Page Items should use Redwood Icons
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case when ITEM_ICON_CSS_CLASSES like 'fa-%'
                         then 'N' 
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    aapi.application_id, 
                    aapi.page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    aapi.last_updated_by,
                    aapi.last_updated_on,
                    aapi.item_id component_id,
                    null parent_component_id,
                    aapi.item_icon_css_classes,
                    aapi.item_name,
						        aapi.workspace
               from apex_application_page_items aapi
               inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
               inner join apex_applications aa on aapi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                             and aa.theme_number = 1000
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
               where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
               and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
               and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude')
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) uses a `Universal Theme` icon: `%3`. You must replace with a `Redwood` icon.',
                    p0 => std.item_name,
                    p1 => std.page_id,
                    p2 => std.application_id,
                    p3 => std.item_icon_css_classes
                    )
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) has an invalid icon',
                    p0 => std.item_name,
                    p1 => std.page_id,
                    p2 => std.application_id
                    )
            end issue_title,
       std.component_id,
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.item_icon_css_classes,
       std.item_name,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: Redwood Page Items cannot use Universal Theme icons
test.fix: Replace the icon with a Redwood Icon. You can look them up [here](r/redwood/redwood-sample-application/icon-browser "redwood icons").
